document.title: Introduction
document.paragraph:
This section of the documentation welcome you to EiffelEnvision and hightlight the major introductory point to help you understand what EiffelEnvision is, how it works and how it can help you build better .NET applications. in_this_section
2 In This Section
overview.xml Introducing EiffelEnvision
Introduces EiffelEnvision, what it is and what it can do for you.
whats_new.xml What's New in EiffelEnvision
If you have previously used EiffelEnvision or Eiffel ENViSioN!, this is a good starting place to find out what is new.
history\index.xml EiffelEnvision Version Information
Browse EiffelEnvision's history of feature additions, enhancements and a maintained list of known issues.
editions.xml EiffelEnvision Editions
A breakdown of the features included in each edition of EiffelEnvision.
